body:
Comment 3: 
I tried bc, which said:
e(9.636293707198417)
15310.49327389602792593512
so the calculation is correct, except that the test vector argument is
e(9.6362937071984173)
15310.49327389603251908310
which is closer to the expected result.  However, the test does not fail on my
systems (linux, 386, Pentium III m and Pentium M).
